text: Tiniharule ta yo cahanchan ki juna prakarale tiniharu aphai kaphira chan, tyastai timi pani avajnakari bha'i sabai ekanasa bha'ihala, tasartha jabasam'ma allahako margama yiniharu pravasa (hijarata) gardainana tabasam'ma tiniharumadhye kasaila'i vastavika mitra nabana'unu. Pheri virodhi bha'epachi jaham phela parchan, samatera marihala ra tiniharumadhye kasaila'i aphno hitaisi ra sathi nabana'u
